channel.title: 2020 on East Back Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in 2020 on East Back Corporation

item.title: Commissioned management of Rubycamp spring 2020 from Shimane Prefecture
item.description: On October 15, 2020, Shimane Prefecture commissioned the operation for the Rubycamp spring of 2020. We have been operating Ruby training camps since 2011, and this is our 10th year.

item.title: Document translation management service "LifeLang" released
item.description: Document translation management service “LifeLang” has been released. LifeLang is a web service that has specialized functions for multilingual translation in addition to basic document management such as text creation, editing, saving, and history display.

item.title: Renewed our website
item.description: Our website was renewed and released on Tuesday, January 21, 2020. Until now, we used Jekyll , a static website generator written in Ruby, to build websites, but now we use Hugo , a static website generator written in Go.
